original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 10.9. Kusalattika, Piṭṭhiduka
analyzed: kusalattika piṭṭhiduka

original: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na na dassanena pahātabba

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ
analyzed: dhammaṃ paṭicca pe na kusalam na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusala

original: nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ
analyzed: na na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na dassanena pahātabba hetuka

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam nana dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa,
analyzed: na kusalam na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisahassa

original: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na kusalam na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ nasavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na kusalam na sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na a vitakkam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nakusalaṁ nasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa, ārammaṇe
analyzed: pe na kusalam na sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa ārammaṇe

original: sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa

original: Nakusalaṁ naavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na avicāram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa

original: Nakusalaṁ nasappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na kusalam na sappītikam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na appītikam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nakusalaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nanapītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: pe na kusalam na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na na pīti sahagatam dhamma

original: paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nanasukhasahagataṁ
analyzed: paṭicca pe na kusalam na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na na sukha sahagata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa

original: Nakusalaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa

original: Nakusalaṁ nanakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nanarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na kusalam na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nakusalaṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa,
analyzed: pe na kusalam na arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisahassa

original: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nanaarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na na arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa

original: Nakusalaṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe āsevane nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa

original: Nakusalaṁ naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na apariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na niyyānikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na kusalam na aniyyānikam dhammam paṭicca sabbattha nava vipākam natthi

original: Nakusalaṁ naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na niyatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na kusalam na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ nasauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na sauttaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe āsevane nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa

original: Nakusalaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasaraṇo ca naakusalo nasaraṇo ca dhammā
analyzed: na kusalam na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na saraṇaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na saraṇaḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na akusalam na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naabyākataṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na abyākatam na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naakusalaṁ nasaraṇañca naabyākataṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na akusalam na saraṇam ca na abyākatam na saraṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ nasaraṇañca naakusalaṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na saraṇam ca na akusalam na saraṇañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava avigate ekavīsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava avigate ekavīsa sabbattha vitthāro

original: Nakusalaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Kusalattikapiṭṭhidukaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: kusala ttika piṭṭhidukam
